entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
